DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , multicenter , open-label , active-controlled study treatment anemia subject CKD dialysis , treatment 52 week .
DOC.brief_title: FG-4592 Treatment Anemia Subjects With Chronic Kidney Disease
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , multicenter , open-label , active-controlled study treatment anemia subject CKD dialysis . Eligible subject randomize FG-4592 epoetin alfa ratio 2:1 . The primary endpoint Hb mean change baseline average Weeks 23 27 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Ages 18 75 year 2 . Subject voluntarily sign date informed consent form ( ICF ) , approve Ethics Committee ( EC ) , nature study explain subject opportunity ask question ; separate ICF need subject participate PK Substudy . 3 . `` Chronic kidney disease endstage renal disease ( ESRD ) either adequate hemodialysis ( HD ) adequate peritoneal dialysis minimum 16 week prior Day 1 : For subject undergo HD , vascular access must via native arteriovenous ( AV ) fistula graft , permanent , tunneled catheter . '' 4 . Subjects must stable dos IV subcutaneous ( SC ) injection epoetin alfa least 6 week prior Day 1 ( average dose ≤15,000 IU/week ) 5 . Mean two recent central laboratory Hb value Screening Period , obtain least 6 day apart , must 9.0 g/dL 12.0 g/dL , inclusive , difference \≤1.5 g/dL high low Hb value . 6 . Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) ≤1.5 x upper limit normal ( ULN ) , normal total bilirubin screen visit except subject Gilberts syndrome ( base central laboratory result ) . 7 . Body weight : 45 100 kg inclusive 8 Subjects agree start take new Traditional Chinese Medicine ( TCM ) anemia change dose , schedule , brand prescreening TCM anemia begin Screening Period end Followup Period . 1 . Any clinically significant infection evidence active underlying infection . 2 . Positive following : human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , antihepatitis C virus antibody ( antiHCV Ab ) . 3 . Chronic liver disease . 4 . New York Heart Association Class III IV congestive heart failure . 5 . Myocardial infarction , acute coronary syndrome , stroke , seizure , thromboembolic event ( eg , deep venous thrombosis pulmonary embolism ) within 52 week prior Day 1 . 6 . Uncontrolled hypertension opinion investigator ( eg , require change antihypertensive medication within 2 week prior randomization ) . 7 . Diagnosis suspicion ( eg , complex kidney cyst Bosniak Category II high ) renal cell carcinoma show screen renal ultrasound . 8 . History malignancy except follow : cancer determine cured remission ≥5 year , curatively resect basal cell squamous cell skin cancer , situ cancer site . 9 . Chronic inflammatory disease glomerulonephritis could impact erythropoiesis ( eg , systemic lupus erythematosis [ SLE ] , rheumatoid arthritis , celiac disease ) . 10 . Clinically significant gastrointestinal bleeding . 11 . Known history myelodysplastic syndrome , multiple myeloma , hereditary hematologic disease thalassemia , sickle cell anemia , pure red cell aplasia , know cause anemia CKD , hemosiderosis , hemochromatosis , know coagulation disorder , hypercoagulable condition . 12 . Any prior functioning organ transplant schedule organ transplantation , anephric . 13 . Anticipated elective surgery could lead significant blood loss study period . 14 . Anticipated use dapsone acetaminophen ( paracetamol ) > 2.0 g/day , > 500 mg per dose repeat every 6 hour 3 day . 15 . Serum albumin < 2.5 g/dL . 16 . Androgen , deferoxamine , deferiprone , deferasirox therapy within 12 week prior Day 1 . 17 . Life expectancy < 12 month . 18 . Blood transfusion within 12 week prior Day 1 anticipate need transfusion . 19 . IV iron supplement Screening Period /or unwilling withhold IV iron . 20 . Immune suppressive systematic steroid treatment within 12 week prior Day 1 . 21 . History alcohol drug abuse within past 2 year inability avoid consumption > 3 alcoholic beverage per day . 22 . Prior treatment FG4592 hypoxiainducible factor prolyl hydroxylase inhibitor ( HIFPHI ) . 23 . Use investigational medication treatment , participation investigational interventional study , carryover effect investigational treatment expect study . 24 . Women pregnant breastfeeding . 25 . Women childbearing potential men sexual partner child bear potential use adequate contraception . 26 .
